price: ߊ߬ ߟߊߛߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߕߍ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߕߙߐ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߤߙߊ߫ ߛߌ߫ ߡߙߊ߬ ߟߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
